# About the author {-}

<table><tr><td>
Stef van Buuren is a statistician at the [Netherlands Organization for
Applied Scientific Research TNO](https://www.tno.nl/en/) in Leiden, and
professor of Statistical Analysis of Incomplete Data at [Utrecht
University](https://www.uu.nl/en). He is the originator of the 
MICE algorithm for multiple imputation of multivariate data, and 
co-developed the 
[`mice`](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/mice/index.html) 
package in `R`. More information can be found at
[stefvanbuuren.name](https://stefvanbuuren.name).
</td>
<td><img src = "fig/stefvanbuuren_em.jpg"></td>
</tr></table>
